attributes.action: The use of Sainte-Laguë method to conduct future general elections.
attributes.additional_details:
Here is a list of websites to use so you can do your own research and make your own conclusion on the subject:

http://electoralreform.wikia.com/wiki/Sainte-Lagu%C3%AB_Method
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elections_in_Norway
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Democracy_Index
https://www.regjeringen.no/en/portal/election-portal/the-norwegian-electoral-system/id456636/
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sainte-Lagu%C3%AB_method
attributes.background: This system is used in Norway who are ranked number 1, in the democracy index. It is used as a way of proportionally representing the UK government. At the moment many parties are either underrepresented or overrepresented in parliament, if based on the percentage people voted.
